channel.title: Inversify on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Inversify on Portfolio

item.title: Things that I learned in week 44
item.description: npm libraries The following libraries should be used with pinned versions - restify@6.3.2 - and inversify-restify-utils@3.3.1 Not even with a micro change restify@6.3.4. It is incompatible with the inversify utils. You get a Constructor already exists error. Semantic versioning is not always reliable! I found a repository pointing out this error as well.
